# Tool URLs (English primary)
JP: 各ツールのURL一覧（日本語は下記）

# Tools URLs

## Core
- tspec-runner (GitHub): https://github.com/jack-low/tspec-runner
- tspec-runner (PyPI): https://pypi.org/project/tspec-runner/

## Package management
- uv: https://github.com/astral-sh/uv
- uv docs: https://docs.astral.sh/uv/

## UI backends
- agent-browser: https://github.com/vercel-labs/agent-browser
- Selenium: https://www.selenium.dev/documentation/
- ChromeDriver: https://chromedriver.chromium.org/
- Appium: https://appium.io/
- Appium UiAutomator2 driver: https://github.com/appium/appium-uiautomator2-driver
- Appium XCUITest driver: https://github.com/appium/appium-xcuitest-driver
- pywinauto: https://pywinauto.readthedocs.io/

## MCP / Neko
- MCP (Model Context Protocol): https://modelcontextprotocol.io/
- Neko (m1k1o/neko): https://github.com/m1k1o/neko
- Neko API docs: https://neko.m1k1o.net/docs/v3/api/

## Game engines / DCC
- Blender: https://www.blender.org/
- Blender API docs: https://docs.blender.org/api/current/
- Unity: https://unity.com/
- Unity scripting API: https://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/

## Testing / Reporting
- pytest: https://docs.pytest.org/
- pytest-html: https://github.com/pytest-dev/pytest-html

## Misc
- Android SDK env vars: https://developer.android.com/studio/command-line/variables
- Xcode: https://developer.apple.com/xcode/
